SEARCH
Package it.polimi.is23am10.client.userinterface

Interface UserInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandLineInterface, GraphicUserInterface
public interface UserInterface
The user interface. Implemented by CommandLineInterface (CLI) and GraphicUserInterface (GUI). Only exposes the output methods. Each implementation will handle input processing accordingly.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayAvailableGames(List<VirtualView> availableGames)
    Method called when the user wants to join an existing game and has to pick between the available ones.

    Method called to notify the user of a new chat message.

    void
    terminateUserInterface()
    Method used when game is over to close input and eventually show infos.

  • Method Details

    • getUserInput

      String getUserInput()
      Method used to retrieve the strings the user might have sent trough their input interface. GUI adds these strings on button clicks while CLI adds them on return.
      Returns:
      The first item in the list. Null if empty.

    • displaySplashScreen

      void displaySplashScreen()
      Method called when first running the game.

    • displayGameJoinGuide

      void displayGameJoinGuide()
      Method to display a quick help guide to explain how to join the games or create one. In GUI enables buttons.

    • displayAvailableGames

      void displayAvailableGames(List<VirtualView> availableGames)
      Method called when the user wants to join an existing game and has to pick between the available ones. It assumes to receive only valid games.
      Parameters:
      availableGames - A list of valid joinable games.

    • displayVirtualView

      void displayVirtualView(VirtualView old, VirtualView vw)
      Method called to display the state of the game.
      Parameters:
      vw - VirtualView of the game to display.

    • displayChatMessage

      void displayChatMessage(ChatMessage message)
      Method called to notify the user of a new chat message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to show to the user.

    • displayError

      void displayError(ErrorMessage errorMessage)
      Method called to notify the user of an error.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - message to show to the user.

    • terminateUserInterface

      void terminateUserInterface()
      Method used when game is over to close input and eventually show infos.
